title: 110_hr6222
content: Working Families Gas Tax Credit Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for up to $500 of the cost of gasoline and diesel used in highway vehicles for a nonbusiness purpose when the increase in the price of a gallon of gasoline exceeds the annual inflation rate by not less than 300. Phases out the amount of such credit for taxpayers with adjusted gross incomes exceeding $75,000 .
